events.message: We have received your application for the Senior Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our tech team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your software development experience.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to assist with the next steps in the hiring process.
Your initial screening went well, and the team was impressed by your technical skills and experience shared during the call.
Thank you for responding promptly to our interview invitation and confirming your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 14:00 UTC with our lead software engineer to discuss your coding skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully and the panel was very impressed with your problem-solving abilities and coding expertise.
Based on your technical performance, an HR interview has been scheduled on April 15th at 11:00 UTC to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The HR interview went well; you demonstrated alignment with the company values and discussed your preferences and expectations clearly.
We are excited to extend you an offer for the Senior Software Engineer role, including competitive salary and benefits outlined in the attached document.
Thank you for your positive feedback on our offer; we appreciate your transparency and look forward to having you onboard.
You have officially accepted the employment offer; welcome to the team! We are excited to move forward with your onboarding.
Your onboarding process has begun with initial training sessions scheduled and access provided to necessary development environments.
The hiring process has been successfully completed. We have onboarded you as a full-time Senior Software Engineer and look forward to your contributions.
